about_the_game:
This DLC adds several contents in collaboration with "The Leviathan's Fantasy"

I. New Collaboration Sects

  • Fantasy Guild

II. New Collaboration Disciples

  • Sun Wukong
  • Yang Jian
  • A Xiu
  • Sylvia
  • Qing Feng
  • Coral
  • Claire
  • Ayina

III. New Collaboration Traits

  • Diligent (Increases stamina and mood limits)
  • Explorer (Increases skill in battle)
  • Trap (Increases trap skill damage)
  • Dinosaur (Chance to summon a dinosaur phantom when using skills)

IV. New Collaboration Techniques

  • Asura Spear
  • Elemental Codex
  • Priest's Code

V. New Decorative Buildings

  • Tyrannosaurus Rex Sculpture
  • King Crab Statue
  • Coral Bonsai
  • Moon Statue
  • Steam Car Statue

VI. Other New Contents

  • Several new collaboration elixirs
  • Can change disciple's Taoist body type to collaboration-exclusive types
detailed_description:
About Recently

We apologize for the negative reviews of this DLC, unrelated to its content. We gave some players in the Chinese community the DLC for free a month before its release, which upset many who bought it. We are very sorry.
